description: Not far from the picturesque village of Pigna, this family-run hotel-restaurant has a simple, classic-style dining room where the main focus is on the equally simple and rustic cuisine, including the dish of goats’ meat and beans, a local speciality.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
